resources.string: If you have not yet joined a game, press menu and \"Play\"!

Joining a game of dippy is serious business. If you are not prepared to follow through and play the game, committing every 24 hours, to the end (bitter or sweet) you will ruin it for your fellow players. If you are not familiar with how dippy is played, or if you want to freshen up a bit on the rules, you need to go to http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Diplomacy/Rules and read them.
Should Droidippy vibrate using a different pattern depending on type of event?
Remove all currently showing widget notifications.
Should Droidippy show orders and results in the classical format?
Wait until all orders are saved
Should Droidippy show a short helpful message the first time you start giving an order?
Should Droidippy show absolute instead of relative times for timestamps and deadlines?
Should Droidippy show game data in the long format?
You must allow Droidippy to authenticate using your Google account if you want to play.

If joining regular games is serious business, then what does joining a \"public-email 1908\" game mean? The answer is even MORE serious business. Your Google account will be visible to everyone in the game, and a few other things will be different from the regular games too. See http://www.oort.se/2011/08/droidippy-gameplay-faq.html#public-email-1908 for a more thorough explanation.
Your reliability statistics will be collected, and you will find yourself playing with people of similar reliability. Keep the deadlines, and you will keep playing engaging and fun games!
You are on probation. Phases will resolve before deadline if everyone except you commit orders. Commit your orders before phase resolution to return to normal.
For the game to end in a draw, every power not surrendering must concur about who the winners are. Not checking your own power is equivalent to surrendering specifically to the checked ones.
Droidippy: Google GCM can\'t find your Google account?
Droidippy: Google GCM needs you to update your Google account password.
Droidippy: You have too many apps using GCM, to use Droidippy you must install some other app.
Droidippy: Google GCM claims your phone does not support GCM?

To make sure this game is enjoyable for you and your fellow players, everyone must abide by some simple rules. Mostly you can guess what they are, but in case you are uncertain you should go to http://www.oort.se/2011/08/droidippy-gameplay-faq.html#rules and read them.
Should Droidippy display a prompt when it expects you to finish giving an order?
You are eliminated or stranded in this game. Do you want to disable notifications for new phases and conference messages?
You are eliminated or stranded in this game. Do you want to enable notifications for new phases and conference messages?
Should Droidippy show finished games in your list of games?
Should Droidippy show invitational games in your list of games?
Should Droidippy show created games in your list of games?
Should Droidippy show zoom buttons on the map view?

Your version of Droidippy is outdated. It will still work, more or less, but upgrading is strongly recommended.;If you have already upgraded and still get this message, try to uninstall and reinstall Droidippy.;If you get this message and Android Market still doesn\'t have an updated version, go to http://droidippy.oort.se/web/static/Droidippy.apk to fetch it from the source.
The phase has resolved and the game has finished.
The phase has resolved and a new phase has begun.
The server seems to have a problem with your purchase of {0}. Contact info@oort.se and your problem will be solved, you will be reimbursed if needed and you will get sincere and profuse apologies.

The server seems to have a problem with what you just did. The developer has been contacted and will try to fix the error, but it would help if you sent an email to info@oort.se explaining what you did when it happened.
The server did not respond as expected to what you did. To get it fixed, you need to send an email to info@oort.se explaining what you did when it happened.
The part of your account before \"@\" will be displayed when you talk in the game chat. Still connect?
Do you want to leave this game?
Do you want to destroy this game?
{0} has been invited to the game.
{0} can not be found. To receive invitations one needs to have logged in to the game at least once.
You have been invited to a game of Droidippy by {0}.
The game is already started, you can\'t invite any more members.
You accepted the invitation too late, the game has already started.

Click the units in {0} to give orders. Use the big arrow left at the bottom to see your order list. Press \"Commit\" in the list to commit your orders. If you have any problems or questions, use the menu button and select \"Help\"!
You are blacklisted, contact info@oort.se for more information.
There was a problem contacting the server. Check your internet connection or try again later.
Should Droidippy play a sound when game events occur?
Should Droidippy notify you about events in the game?
Should Droidippy vibrate the phone when game events occur?
What ringtone should Droidippy use when game events occur?
The game uses random positions, and you will be randomly assigned a power to play.
Before you can join a game you must rank the great powers in order of preference. Reorder the list on the left side, scroll it on the right.
Before you can create a game you must rank the great powers in order of preference. Reorder the list on the left side, scroll it on the right.
No matching game found. Are you sure you entered the right invitation code?

You have joined an invitational game. The game will start as soon as enough other players have been found. You can cancel the game up until when it starts by long clicking it.

Please support the hosting, administration, moderation and development of online dippy resources by donating.

You have created a game. To get the game started you must invite players to it. Use the invite button or give them the invitation code to let them join. You can cancel the game up until when it starts by long clicking it.

Please support the hosting, administration, moderation and development of online dippy resources by donating.

You are signed up to join a game. The game will start as soon as enough other players have been found. This may take between a few hours and a few days, have faith.

Please support the hosting, administration, moderation and development of online dippy resources by donating.
A google account is required to use this app!
Enter the google account of the player you want to invite.
Enter orders on the map to see them here.
Select where to support it, or select the same unit again to support a Hold

This game client is too old, you have to upgrade!;If you have already upgraded and still get this message, try to uninstall and reinstall Droidippy.;If you get this message and Android Market still doesn\'t have an updated version, go to http://droidippy.oort.se/web/static/Droidippy.apk to fetch it from the source.
The game server does not yet support this game client, downgrade or wait for the server to be upgraded.
Expected a province with an army present? Cancelled action!
Expected a province with a unit present? Cancelled action!
How sensitive should the long click on units on the map be to finger movements?
How large should the fonts used in Droidippy be?
